welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alliance, where the charm of the Midwest meets the beauty of the American West. Get ready to experience our famous Carhenge, explore our charming downtown, and immerse yourself in our unique culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
